metadata.title: CVE-2021-26826 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A stack overflow issue exists in Godot Engine up to v3.2 and is caused byimproper boundary checks when loading .TGA image files. Depending on thecontext of the application, attack vector can be local or remote, and canlead to code execution and/or system crash.

criterions.comment: godot package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
